entry.title: DeFi Teams Issue Stark On-Chain Warning to Curve Finance Hacker
entry.summary: The on-chain message stated that the DeFi teams intend to pursue the Curve Finance hacker "from all angles with the full extent of the law."

entry.title: Revolut to Shutter US Crypto Operations Due to 'Regulatory Environment'
entry.summary: From September 2, Revolut will suspend its cryptocurrency services in the U.S., with complete access disabled from October 3.

entry.title: Brave's New Image and Video Search Doesn't Rely on Google or Bing
entry.summary: Looking to enhance user privacy, crypto-friendly browser Brave now offers independent image and video search results.

entry.title: 'Guild of Guardians' RPG Could Be Your Next Mobile Gaming Fix
entry.summary: PREVIEW: Immutable’s upcoming Guild of Guardians blends dungeon strategy with casual, mobile fun. We go hands-on.

entry.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Just Got Smarter: Here’s the Latest on the AI Chatbot
entry.summary: Upload multiple files, suggested prompts and replies, and a whole lot more. OpenAI just released a bevy of updates for ChatGPT.

entry.title: Ukraine Charity Soccer Match Hits the Metaverse Pitch to Raise Funds
entry.summary: Saturday's Game4Ukraine match will raise money for Ukraine, and if you can't be in London, then you can watch (and donate) in the metaverse.

entry.title: Coinbase Seeks to 'Optimize' Amid Bitcoin Bear Market, Beats Earnings Expectations
entry.summary: America’s leading crypto exchange beat analysts' profit and revenue expectations for the second quarter in a row.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey's Block Reports $5.5 Billion in Q2 Revenue—Almost Half of It From Bitcoin
entry.summary: The company topped profit expectations for its latest quarter.

entry.title: Elvis Presley Dances Into the Metaverse via 'The Sandbox'
entry.summary: Some 3,000 Elvis Presley NFT avatars will launch in the Ethereum game that’s home to Snoop Dogg, McDonald’s, and many more.

entry.title: New York Times Pushes Back Against Sam Bankman-Fried Gag Order
entry.summary: The Gray Lady’s letter follows a report that landed Bankman-Fried back in court.

entry.title: Bitfinex Hacker Revealed: Razzlekhan's Husband Admits He Stole Billions in Bitcoin
entry.summary: It's long been suspected the couple hacked the crypto exchange, but only now been confirmed by Lichtenstein's admission in court.

entry.title: SHIB Developers Aim to Leave Meme Coin Label Behind With New Identity Protocol Launch
entry.summary: Shiba Inu devs announced plans to tie digital identity services to all SHIB platform applications in a move to leave its meme coin status.

entry.title: SEC Says Crypto Mining Firm Fraudulently Raised $50M in Cash, Bitcoin and Ethereum
entry.summary: Also known as DEBT Box, the crypto firm allegedly lied to investors, according to the SEC.

entry.title: 'Wreck League' Mech Fighter Grows the 'Extended Yugaverse' With Bored Apes
entry.summary: Fighting game Wreck League will feature the Bored Ape Yacht Club and other Yuga Labs IP, with both NFT and "Web2" versions available.

entry.title: Gala Games Titles Arrive on Elixir Games Launcher
entry.summary: The partnership between Gala Games and Elixir Games will see titles like Town Star and Spider Tanks launch on the Web3 games platform.

entry.title: 3 Opportunities NFT Games Should Seize to Achieve Mass Adoption
entry.summary: Games developers are ignoring opportunities that are unique to Web3, according to industry veteran Sam Barberie.

entry.title: Coinbase Enlists Coca-Cola, Atari Ahead of Base Mainnet Launch
entry.summary: Coinbase has tapped major brands for its "Onchain Summer" event ahead of the Base mainnet launching on August 9.

entry.title: Binance Announces New Compliance and Money Laundering Reporting Officer
entry.summary: Kristen Hecht brings 17 years of experience in financial crime compliance at a time when Binance is juggling a host of complaints.

entry.title: Argent Takes Key Step Towards 'Invisible Wallet' With Newest Web Wallet Launch
entry.summary: Argent takes another step in making its crypto wallet disappear, rolling out a new web wallet that resembles your favorite web2 banking app.

entry.title: DeFi Blue-Chip Tokens Hit With Bearish Week Amid Curve Finance Hack
entry.summary: The hack on one of the largest decentralized exchanges earlier this week has triggered a negative pullback across the DeFi sector.

entry.title: Robinhood Sees Crypto Trading Revenue Plummet 18% in Latest Earnings
entry.summary: The drop comes amid Robinhood’s decision to discontinue support for certain tokens, which were identified as securities by the SEC.

entry.title: Australian Financial Watchdog Takes eToro to Court Over High-Risk Trading Products
entry.summary: ASIC is taking eToro to court over "over the appropriateness of its target market for contract-for-difference" products.

entry.title: Despite Name Brand NFT Deals, Nifty's Shuts Down
entry.summary: Even with a star-studded launch and a recent Web3 pivot, the company shut down abruptly late Wednesday.

entry.title: Mind Over Paralysis: AI Helps Quadriplegic Man Move and Feel Again
entry.summary: The impossible became possible after a medical team performed a double neural bypass.

entry.title: AI Startup Inworld Raises $50M to Create Better Video Game Characters
entry.summary: The company’s tech has already been used to flesh out NPCs in games like Skyrim and Grand Theft Auto V.

entry.title: Elizabeth Warren, Bernie Sanders Demand Crackdown on ‘Crypto Tax Evaders’
entry.summary: The IRS and the Treasury are coming up against a deadline, and Democrats have little patience left.

entry.title: How Coinbase Makes Money Has Shifted Since Its IPO
entry.summary: The exchange’s agreement with USDC stablecoin issuer Circle has been a boon as interest rates march higher.

entry.title: AI Investments Could Surge to $200 Billion Globally by 2025: Goldman Sachs
entry.summary: The growth of AI could have a greater impact than the discovery of electricity or the arrival of personal computers.

entry.title: New York Bill Would Protect Writers and Actors From Being Replaced by AI
entry.summary: Legislators at both state and federal levels are moving to protect people and jobs.

entry.title: Amazon Prime Is Giving Out Free NFTs for This Polygon Game
entry.summary: Prime subscribers can now snag a free Polygon NFT and in-game currency for Mojo Melee, with more freebies to come.

entry.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges
entry.summary: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.

entry.title: These Are the High-Profile Ethereum Futures ETF Applications Currently in Play
entry.summary: The first Ethereum futures ETF could be launched as soon as October 2023—that is, if the SEC approves it.

entry.title: Gaming Giant Bandai Namco Launches AI Virtual Pet NFT Game
entry.summary: Bandai Namco Research and partners have rolled out a virtual pet game, joining other publishers like Ubisoft and Sega on the Oasys blockchain.

entry.title: Litecoin Just Had Its Third Halving—Here's What That Means for LTC
entry.summary: So far, it isn’t looking too good for the Bitcoin fork which recently experienced resurgence.

entry.title: 'Show Your Face to the Orb': Eyes-on With Sam Altman's Worldcoin
entry.summary: In former East Berlin, Sam Altman’s Worldcoin is scanning irises for tokens—under the watchful eye of European privacy watchdogs.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Lawyers Say Basis for Revoking Bail Is 'Extremely Thin'
entry.summary: Bankman-Fried's defense fights back against the DOJ’s recent motion, saying it's based on “innuendo” and “assumptions.”

entry.title: Kenya Suspends Worldcoin Operations Amid Privacy Concerns
entry.summary: Worldcoin faces further scrutiny over its iris-scanning project, despite over 2 million sign-ups worldwide.

entry.title: Coinbase Mulling Best Ways to Integrate Lightning Network for Bitcoin
entry.summary: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong has reiterated the crypto exchange’s intention to add support for Bitcoin’s Layer-2 scaling solution.

entry.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee
entry.summary: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.

entry.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee
entry.summary: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.

entry.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO
entry.summary: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor
entry.summary: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.

entry.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect
entry.summary: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.

entry.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies
entry.summary: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.

entry.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead
entry.summary: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.

entry.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder
entry.summary: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.

entry.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.

entry.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers
entry.summary: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.
